Address.label: Address
Address.value: 400 BIRMINGHAM HIGHWAY, CHATTANOOGA, Tennessee, 37419, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Covenant Logistics Group Inc, formerly Covenant Transportation Group Inc, together with its wholly-owned subsidiaries offers truckload transportation and freight brokerage services to customers throughout the continental United States. The company's reportable segments include Expedited, Dedicated Services, Managed Freight and Warehousing.
